data.title: [90’s Movie Month] Live Tweeting The Cable Guy (1996)
data.meta_description: Welcome back to another live tweet session, kicking off 90's movie month with Ben Stiller's The Cable Guy. Here we go a live tweet session of #TheCableGuy I actually think it's one of the best comedy of the 90's, it's a dark film that audiences didn't get #TheCableGuy Ben Stiller did a good job as…
data.text:
Welcome back to another live tweet session, kicking off 90’s movie month with Ben Stiller’s The Cable Guy.

Here we go a live tweet session of #TheCableGuy

I actually think it’s one of the best comedy of the 90’s, it’s a dark film that audiences didn’t get #TheCableGuy

Ben Stiller did a good job as director, good cast as well. A unique role for Jim Carrey #TheCableGuy

A nice satire on TV too, and there’s Jack Black #TheCableGuy

Could do without seeing Matthew Broderick in the shower though #TheCableGuy

Here’s Jim Carrey and I love the way he plays this. It’s over the top but not extreme. #TheCableGuy

It’s a good opening, very unsuspecting. No idea what to expect if it’s a first time watch. #TheCableGuy

Great Jim Carrey is molesting the wall … #TheCableGuy

Broderick’s character is such an annoying ass. #TheCableGuy

Love the on going courtcase on the TV with Stiller as Sam Sweet #TheCableGuy

Broderick’s character deserves a punch in the face #TheCableGuy

After he acts like a dick he tries to get free movie channels off the cable guy. #TheCableGuy

Jim Carrey’s character is lonely … poor bastard #TheCableGuy

Even if he’s unhinged the cable guy is a nice dude. Just don’t piss him off yo #TheCableGuy

I wonder if this film came out today whether it would still be a flop #TheCableGuy

They both have Daddy issues #TheCableGuy

This film has some great dialogue #TheCableGuy

Jim Carrey’s character has been so poorly treated he’s desperate for a friend but he could have done better than asshole Brod #TheCableGuy

Yep Brod, Leslie Mann should have dumped your ass #TheCableGuy

Now the stalking commenses and it’s really creepy … brrrrr #TheCableGuy

This basketball game is pretty hilarious, it’s well done #TheCableGuy

If Jim Carrey’s shorts were any shorter he would be wearing jocks … eeeesh #TheCableGuy

Even though he’s totally unhinged, when Brod tells him they aren’t friends Jim just get heartbroken so sad #TheCableGuy

He plays it well and he would be less sympathetic if Brod wasn’t such an ass #TheCableGuy

So Judd Apatow wrote a lot of this film and Leslie Mann is in it … coincidence? #TheCableGuy

So now he needs help the cable guy is his friend … jerk!!!! #TheCableGuy

He’s so selfish! I can’t side with Brod, Jim Carrey all the way! #TheCableGuy

He’s so cunning though, but he’s not stupid. If things don’t go his way he will stuff your life up! #TheCableGuy

Jim Carrey’s character as a kid was raised on TV but most of us were #TheCableGuy

I would love to go to one of these medieval restaurants – looks like fun #TheCableGuy

It’s Ms Garafalo in a fun cameo! #TheCableGuy

Would have been interesting if Chris Farley had played the cable guy. #TheCableGuy

The silence of the lambs scene is so random! #TheCableGuy

Now they battle! It looks so much fun though #TheCableGuy

Ooooops the fake out manuvuer! Go Jim! Kick his asshole face in #TheCableGuy

“It’s like when Kirk and Spock had to do battle” and they play the music hehe #TheCableGuy

Lol now they battle on horses, yeah he’s not unhinged at all #TheCableGuy

Totally not creepy breaking into someone’s place and leaving them a home entertainment system. Call the cops maybe?! #TheCableGuy

Surely his character can’t be that stupid … #TheCableGuy

Where did all these people come from for a karaoke party?! #TheCableGuy

Lol he gets him a lose your lisp tape, uuuhhhh ok #TheCableGuy

Ha I had forgotten he got him a hooker! Yep why hasn’t he called the cops #TheCableGuy

At least Rick aka Jack Black is on to the cable guy, he’s not stupid #TheCableGuy

Jim Carrey singing Somebody To Love is just glorious #TheCableGuy

The song is quite fitting when you listen to the lyrics and what the Brod goes through in the film #TheCableGuy

I love how trippy this scene is, fits in perfectly #TheCableGuy

Nothing quite beats Carrey’s 70’s outfit #TheCableGuy

Gotta love the sneaky polaroids he takes … naughty #TheCableGuy

Ren and Stimpy on the tv WOOO #TheCableGuy

Ha he finds out she was a prostitute, like really how did he not know?! #TheCableGuy

Yes get the unstable man angry … that’ll work out well Brod #TheCableGuy

Carrey looks like creepy Ben Stiller in his ‘disguise’ #TheCableGuy

Leslie Mann on a date with sleazy Owen Wilson #TheCableGuy

Ah the lovely bathroom assault scene, that’s not overkill at all #TheCableGuy

Assault via eye brow plucking … hardcore #TheCableGuy

He’s that unstable he still tries to help Brod … #TheCableGuy

Eric Roberts cameo that’s just brilliant #TheCableGuy

Now he’s all charming to Robin, classic tactic #TheCableGuy

Ah the perfect manipulator #TheCableGuy

Oh boy now Brod’s life is going to go to the shitter, but he sort of deserves it #TheCableGuy

Brod is such a bad friend, just dumps poor Jack Black #TheCableGuy

Geez you’re breaking his heart Brod, big mistake #TheCableGuy

He’s got great tactics for messing with people who flob him off #TheCableGuy

He took it to the extreme, he’s getting arrested for stolen goods. Because you know he was stupid enough to not question Carrey #TheCableGuy

“Are you taking the pot” says his father haha #TheCableGuy

Bad luck Brod weekend in lock up, oh and here’s Carrey to cause more trouble. #TheCableGuy

Oh yeah he flashes his nipple, he knows what to do #TheCableGuy

Creep factor at 300% right now #TheCableGuy

Oh good make up with your only true friend, smart move Brod #TheCableGuy

Chip Douglas, Larry Tate … clever names #TheCableGuy

Now he’s at the parents house, creepy cable guy #TheCableGuy

Porno password is clearly the best game ever #TheCableGuy

“The password is vagina” #TheCableGuy

“Penith … penith …” #TheCableGuy

Better Call Saul is Brod’s brother in this, how did I not notice #TheCableGuy

Brod you are acting crazy, that’s not how you deal with it … #TheCableGuy

Ha Brod punched him in front of the family, bad bad move #TheCableGuy

He hacks the computer system, seriously Brod don’t you know how to handle anything? #TheCableGuy

He gets you arrested and fired, seriously dude how do you keep making bad decisions #TheCableGuy

Oh finally the smart one, Jack Black figures out that Carrey is loopy #TheCableGuy

“They booted his ass for stalking customers” yeah no shit #TheCableGuy

But you know don’t call the cops or anything … #TheCableGuy
